an1.316:1.1: “Ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamano uppajjati bahujanaahitaya bahujanaasukhaya, bahuno janassa anatthaya ahitaya dukkhaya devamanussanam.
an1.316:1.4: So bahujanam saddhamma vutthapetva asaddhamme patitthapeti.
an1.316:1.5: Ayam kho, bhikkhave, ekapuggalo loke uppajjamano uppajjati bahujanaahitaya bahujanaasukhaya, bahuno janassa anatthaya ahitaya dukkhaya devamanussanan”ti.
an1.317:1.1: “Ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamano uppajjati bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya, bahuno janassa atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
an1.317:1.4: So bahujanam asaddhamma vutthapetva saddhamme patitthapeti.
an1.317:1.5: Ayam kho, bhikkhave, ekapuggalo loke uppajjamano uppajjati bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya, bahuno janassa atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanan”ti.
an1.318:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam mahasavajjam yathayidam, bhikkhave, micchaditthi.
an1.319:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekapuggalampi samanupassami yo evam bahujanaahitaya patipanno bahujanaasukhaya, bahuno janassa anatthaya ahitaya dukkhaya devamanussanam yathayidam, bhikkhave, makkhali moghapuriso.
an1.319:1.2: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, nadimukhe khippam uddeyya bahunam macchanam ahitaya dukkhaya anayaya byasanaya;
an1.319:1.3: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, makkhali moghapuriso manussakhippam manne loke uppanno bahunam sattanam ahitaya dukkhaya anayaya byasanaya”ti.
an1.320:1.1: “Durakkhate, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo ca samadapeti yanca samadapeti yo ca samadapito tathattaya patipajjati sabbe te bahum apunnam pasavanti.
an1.321:1.1: “Svakkhate, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo ca samadapeti yanca samadapeti yo ca samadapito tathattaya patipajjati sabbe te bahum punnam pasavanti.
an1.322:1.1: “Durakkhate, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye dayakena matta janitabba, no patiggahakena.
an1.323:1.1: “Svakkhate, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye patiggahakena matta janitabba, no dayakena.
an1.324:1.1: “Durakkhate, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo araddhaviriyo so dukkham viharati.
an1.325:1.1: “Svakkhate, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo kusito so dukkham viharati.
an1.326:1.1: “Durakkhate, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo kusito so sukham viharati.
an1.327:1.1: “Svakkhate, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo araddhaviriyo so sukham viharati.
an1.328:1.2: evamevam kho aham, bhikkhave, appamattakampi bhavam na vannemi, antamaso accharasanghatamattampi”.
an1.329:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, appamattakampi muttam duggandham hoti … appamattakopi khelo duggandho hoti … appamattakopi pubbo duggandho hoti … appamattakampi lohitam duggandham hoti;
an1.329:1.2: evamevam kho aham, bhikkhave, appamattakampi bhavam na vannemi, antamaso accharasanghatamattampi”.
